ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing Spectres at level 39
ygData.msgSnippet: dunno if that is true or not.  on certain mobs you do have to be in melee range to cast on them, but it is always necessary against tough mobs because you
ygData.messageBody:
dunno if that is true or not. on certain mobs you do have to be in melee
range to cast on them, but it is always necessary against tough mobs because
you don't want the "ping pong" effect where you pull the mob to you and away
from all the tanks beating up on it.

Shada


> I know casters get less resists when they are right up on the mob.
> Often times when I have watched my woman play in Hate she
> must be right
> outside the melee circle or the resists are terrible. I'd assume that
> it is the same with songs.
